name: New York Drill
description: Emerged in the late 2010s, characterized by energetic, bouncy tresillo rhythms, creating a warmer, more booming tone than UK Drill, which prominently inspired it.

children.name: Sample Drill
children.description: Prominent, recognizable samples set to tresillo-styled Drill hi-hats and counter snares.

children.name: Sexy Drill
children.description: Emotive and sensual melodies, samples, and basslines set to driving stomps and bouncy Drill percussion typically joined by lyrical themes of sex, love, clubbing, and heartbreak.
